Text:
Ok, people. I get loads of questions about not working trackers. Because of several international lawsuits the old Piratebay trackers aren't up anymore. Here's a list of trackers that are up and running:

http://tracker.openbittorrent.com/announce

http://tracker.publicbt.com/announce

http://denis.stalker.h3q.com:6969/announce

Of course you keep using DHT combined with Peer Exchange.
